ComicInfo.Characters: VILLAIN: Donavin Conrad,Natalia Kassle,Sydney Savage,Silicon Valerie,FEATURE: Abbey Chase
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:41:25 [Issue ID 4000-105730] urn:comicvine:4000-105730 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:08:57. [Issue ID 339482]
ComicInfo.Summary: An introduction into the world of Danger Girl. The first issue focuses on Abbey Chase though other members are highlighted. A sequence of the issue pays homage to James Bond running across alligators in the movie Live and Let Die.
ComicInfo.Title: Prelude to Danger
ComicInfo.Writer: Andy Hartnell,J. Scott Campbell,Andy Hartnell,J. Scott Campbell
ComicInfo.Colorist: Joe Chiodo,Martin Jimenez,Ben Dimagmaliw,Guy Major,Justin Ponsor,Joe Chiodo,Martin Jimenez,Ben Dimagmaliw,Guy Major,Justin Ponsor
